admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise the following
            operations: rehabilitation of about 3,000 km of roads in
            five provinces; improvement of routine and periodic road
            maintenance in those five and a further 15 provinces;
            rehabilitation of workshops in the 20 provinces; pilot
            training and experimental programs for all phases of highway
            work; implementation of inventory and costing techniques;
            and technical assistance to support these operations.
